snippet.title: Entwined™ Challenge (by PlayStation Mobile Inc.) - Universal - HD Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Entwined™ Challenge by PlayStation Mobile Inc.

‘Entwined Challenge’ is an addictive and beautiful action reflex game that will mesmerize your senses and challenge your skills. Can you control two characters at the same time and master their path to evolution?

With a critically acclaimed soundtrack from Sam Marshall and stunning visual design, ‘Entwined Challenge’ will draw you into a unique sense of gaming zen.

Created by Pixelopus, a new Sony team who recently released ‘Entwined’ on the PlayStation® formats, ‘Entwined Challenge’ contains an ALL NEW version of the Challenge Mode from the console game with the following features:

• All new scoring system and online leaderboards to challenge your friends.
• All new unlockables with never before seen concept art, behind the scenes sketches and videos.
• All new touch control scheme specially designed for touchscreen devices.
• 5 uniquely designed levels based on the Asian elements (Water, Wood, Fire, Earth and Metal)
• No ‘in app purchases’. One time purchase price gets you everything in the game!

iTunes Store Page:

https://itunes.apple.com/nz/app/entwined-challenge/id919658560

Homepage:

http://www.playstation.com/en-us/games/entwined-ps4
